subject: Football
Football
Sexual Harassment
lead_paragraph: A lawsuit filed by two massage therapists who sued the retired N.F.L. quarterback Brett Favre over claims he sent racy text messages while he was with the Jets has been settled, a lawyer for the women said.
snippet: A lawsuit filed by two massage therapists who sued the retired N.F.L. quarterback Brett Favre over claims he sent racy text messages while he was with the Jets has been settled, a lawyer for the women said.
